projects.name: REEL 2013
projects.description: Reel contains various projects for Trollback + Company and friends.

projects.name: modavanti
projects.description:
I directed, filmed, synced audio, and edited this video for Modavanti, a sustainable fashion webshop using Adobe Premiere and
Adobe After Effects.

projects.name: Project 3
projects.description: Working freelance for Trollback + Company, I edited video for this montage showcasing clips taken with the stop motion timelapse app Step using Final Cut Pro.
